hypothesis_content.title: Momentum Reversal After Extreme 1-Day BTC Drop
hypothesis_content.statement: If BTC experiences a 1-day price drop exceeding -8% during a NEUTRAL or BULL regime, a short-term momentum reversal will occur within the next 3 trading days, generating a mean-reversion bounce of at least +3% from the intraday low.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme single-day drops in non-stress regimes often represent panic selling or overreaction rather than structural breakdown. Institutional and algorithmic buyers frequently step in to buy these dips, creating a short-term momentum reversal. The current neutral regime with waning crypto momentum suggests these conditions may be met.
entry_conditions: Current regime is NEUTRAL or BULL (confidence > 60%)
Enter long at market open following the extreme down day

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches +3% from entry day's intraday low OR +5% from entry price

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 55% of such signals fail to achieve the +3% bounce target within 3 days OR the average return is negative after accounting for slippage and transaction costs.
